column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: religion. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix ontoRel: <http://www.example.org/ontology/Religion#> .# ClassesontoRel:Religion rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:comment "The class of all religions" .ontoRel:Hinduism rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ontoRel:Religion ;    rdfs:comment "A major world religion originating from the Indian subcontinent" .ontoRel:Christianity rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ontoRel:Religion ;    rdfs:comment "A major world religion based on the life and teachings of Jesus Christ" .ontoRel:Islam rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ontoRel:Religion ;    rdfs:comment "A major world religion based on the teachings of Prophet Muhammad" .ontoRel:Buddhism rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ontoRel:Religion ;    rdfs:comment "A major world religion or philosophy based on the teachings of Buddha" .# PropertiesontoRel:hasOrigin rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ontoRel:Religion ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:comment "The geographic origin of a religion" .ontoRel:hasFounder rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ontoRel:Religion ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:comment "The founder of a religion" .ontoRel:numberOfAdherents rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ontoRel:Religion ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:comment "The estimated number of adherents of a religion" .# IndividualsontoRel:ChristianityIndividual rdf:type ontoRel:Christianity ;    ontoRel:hasOrigin "Middle East" ;    ontoRel:hasFounder "Jesus Christ" ;    ontoRel:numberOfAdherents "2.3 billion" .ontoRel:HinduismIndividual rdf:type ontoRel:Hinduism ;    ontoRel:hasOrigin "Indian subcontinent" ;    ontoRel:hasFounder "No single founder" ;    ontoRel:numberOfAdherents "1.15 billion" .ontoRel:IslamIndividual rdf:type ontoRel:Islam ;    ontoRel:hasOrigin "Arabian Peninsula" ;    ontoRel:hasFounder "Prophet Muhammad" ;    ontoRel:numberOfAdherents "1.9 billion" .ontoRel:BuddhismIndividual rdf:type ontoRel:Buddhism ;    ontoRel:hasOrigin "Indian subcontinent" ;    ontoRel:hasFounder "Gautama Buddha" ;    ontoRel:numberOfAdherents "535 million" .
